MemoryInfobox.description: 'After Kassandra led the Spartans to victory at Megaris, a Blacksmith lamented his lost payment for the weapons he had provided to the Athens|Athenians.'

General_Description: '''Rightfully Mine''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra's attention was drawn by a blacksmith.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Need something?''
*'''Man:''' ''Well, if it isn't the great "hero" of [[Megaris]] come to save us all.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You lose [[drachma]]e betting on [[Athens]]?''
*'''Man:''' ''Hardly! [[Megara]] had been stable for awhile. I equipped the Athenians for their battles until you wiped them all out. Now there's no one left to pay me.''
<tabber>
|-|You're lucky to be alive.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''War takes more than drachmae from most, friend. Count yourself lucky.''
|-|Get paid up front next time.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The Athenians got what was coming for them, and so did you if you weren't smart enough to get paid up front.''
</tabber>
*'''Man:''' ''Bah! Keep your advice. If you really wanted to make it up to me, you'd help me get what's rightfully mine from the Athenians.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And you want me to get it from the Athenians.''
*'''Man:''' ''Yes, it needs to be returned without a scratch.''
(Accept - I'll bring it to you.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take care of it.''
*'''Man:''' ''Thank you, [[mercenary]].''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.''
Kassandra left the man, found his pouch of drachmae, and returned to the man.
*'''Man:''' ''Tell me it's been handled,'' misthios.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's all yours.''
*'''Man:''' ''I'm a man of my word, so here's your reward.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
Section_Trivia: *This memory seems to be triggered by [[The Final Push]]. Other variables are unknown.
